situation.title: Operation of Offices
situation.meta_description: Office hours are limited to 2 days a week for 5 hours.

situation.title: ID Exchange
situation.meta_description: If your driving license or professional driver's qualification license has expired during the state of emergency, you do not need to change it, as it is still considered valid.

situation.title: Notaries, lawyers, executors
situation.meta_description: The general ban on service providers does not apply to lawyers, notaries, or executors.

situation.title: Execution of the sentence imprisonment
situation.meta_description: In a state of emergency visits to prisons, remand prisons, and security detention facilities are prohibited.

situation.title: Courts
situation.meta_description: The courts continue functioning even in times of emergency, but it's necessary to follow the general rules, especially to observe hygienic measures.

situation.title: Tax advisors
situation.meta_description: The general ban on service providers does not apply to tax advisors.
